page.title: 15HILL TOP FARM
page.content: {Hill Top farm}is one of many farms owned by{Nostell Estate.}The farm consists of 162 acres of both pastoral and arable land. The farmer keeps 121 head of Fresian cattle which are only used for milking. The farm buys cattle from markets all over the area as it would be too expensive to breed their own. The cows produce between 6100 and 7500 litres of milk per year. The fields that are not used for pasture are used for suger beet, potatoes and lay-grass. The farmer sub-lets land to other farmers who want to grow potatoes,wheat and peas. The crops that he grows are mainly used to feed his own cattle rather than as a cash crop
